title: Instagram : number of brand sponsored influencer posts 2016 to 2020
summary: The statistic shows the Annual of posts millions in Instagram 2016 , with a projection from 2019 to 2020 .
In 2016 , the Annual of posts millions amounted to about 1.26 millions .
In 2020 , the millions of the posts above the age of millions was forecasted to reach 6.12 millions .
gold: This statistic presents the number of brand sponsored influencer posts on Instagram from 2016 to 2020.
In 2018 , there were 3.7 million brand sponsored influencer posts on the social platform.
The volume of sponsored content on Instagram is projected to amount to 4.95 million posts in 2019 .
